response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age", "low", "Being a young adult generally indicates lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("Gender", "low", "Gender alone does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Race", "medium", "Research shows that Black individuals may face higher risk due to systemic factors, but individual circumstances are more important."),
    ("Prior Arrests", "low", "Only one prior arrest is a relatively low number for recidivism prediction."),
    ("Conviction Status", "low", "Not being convicted suggests lower risk as it implies no formal sentencing or probation violations."),
    ("Height and Weight", "low", "Physical attributes generally do not predict recidivism."),
    ("Marital Status", "low", "Being unmarried does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Living Arrangement", "low", "Living alone is not a significant predictor of recidivism."),
    ("Enrollment in School", "low", "Being enrolled in school generally indicates lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("Employment History", "medium", "Having held only one job may indicate higher risk of recidivism."),
    ("Drug Use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years is a positive factor for recidivism prediction."),
    ("Depression", "high", "Feeling persistently down can be associated with higher risk of recidivism."),
    ("Family Structure", "medium", "Growing up in a two-parent household generally indicates lower risk, but individual circumstances are more important."),
    ("Rural Upbringing", "low", "Living in a rural area does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Religious Beliefs", "low", "Belief in God does not significantly predict recidivism.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 60
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 5 inches and weighs 145 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He is enrolled in school at the present moment. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 5, in a rural area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
